articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the command of KPA Unit 6556.
					 He dropped in at the operation command room to learn in detail about the performance of the unit's duty.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to see all servicepersons of the unit performing their guard duty in a responsible manner, closely following the enemies' moves for aggression. He appreciated their efforts and set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the unit to boost its combat capability in everyway.
					
					 Going round the rooms for the study of military affairs, he acquainted himself with commanding officers' training.
					
					 He noted with satisfaction that the unit is preparing all its commanding officers as competent officers capable of skillfully organizing and commanding any difficult combat duty in a modern warfare. He underscored the need for the unit to thoroughly establish the revolutionary trait of training so that all the commanding officers may acquire commanding ability as required by the modern warfare.
					
					 He looked round soldiers' hall and other cultural and educational facilities to learn about how the political work is conducted among soldiers there.
					
					 Walking the compound of the premise of the command which looks like a park, he learned about the management of the unit.
					
					 The unit has brought remarkable changes in all aspects including combat and political training and unit management, he said, praising the shining feats of the unit which has displayed valor as lifeguards standing on the first line of the class struggle, while sharing destiny with the party for the victory in the revolutionary cause.
					
					 Then he made the rounds of a mess hall, kitchen, non-staple food store and other supply service facilities to pay deep attention to soldiers' living.
					
					 He praised the commanding officers of the unit for having provided soldiers with good living conditions with a correct viewpoint on the supply service.
					
					 He had a photo session with the soldiers of the unit.
					
					 Accompanying him were Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, KPA General Kim Won Hong, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, and KPA General Hyon Chol Hae, member of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Medical Institute of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Medical Institute of KPA
						
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Jongsong Combined Medical Institute of the Korean People's Army newly constructed by soldier builders.
					 After looking round the room devoted to the history of the institute, he visited a medicine examination office, medicine research institute, E-library, cultural hall and other places to learn in detail about the scientific researches and medicine production. 
					
					 He made the rounds of ultra-modern research rooms, various laboratories and production processes furnished with modern pharmaceutical equipment. He was greatly satisfied to learn that the appearance of the institute which can positively contribute to the promotion of the people's health led to laying a solid foundation of the Juche-based pharmaceutical industry.
					
					 He was very pleased to learn that all the scientists and researchers of the institute developed a lot of new varieties of medicines and appreciated their efforts.
					
					 Seeing varieties of efficacious medicines produced by the institute, he was very pleased that they are very high in their quality and it successfully produced reserve medicines, in particular, so that people may use them under any circumstances.
					
					 He put forth the tasks facing the institute.
					
					 Calling on its scientists, technicians and workers to actively develop medicines suited to the constitution of Koreans and introduce them to production, he underlined the need to massively produce varieties of medicines, upgrade their quality and decisively improve their packing. 
					
					  Devotion is an attribute and life and soul of socialist healthcare serving the popular masses, he said, calling on all the employees of the institute to truly serve the people with warm love for them.
					
					 He called on all the officials, workers and technicians in the pharmaceutical field to produce and supply more medicines to treatment and prevention organs so as to enable the people to lead a happy and long life in a thriving country, saying sixty is the full prime of life and ninety is the gate to old age. 
					
					 Accompanying him were Chief of the KPA General Staff Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General  Kim Won Hong, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, members of the C.C., the WPK and department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Lunar New Year's Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Lunar New Year's Concert
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed with senior officials of the party, state and army the Lunar New Year's concert given by the Unhasu Orchestra.
					 When he appeared in the auditorium of the theatre, the audience enthusiastically welcomed him, offering him lunar New Year greetings in reflection of the profound reverence of all the service personnel and people.
					
					 He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the audience and warmly congratulated them on the lunar New Year.
					
					 The concert included numbers like "The Korean Nation Is the Best", "Song of Friendship," "My Wife" and "We Love Thee Socialism".
					
					 The performers successfully represented the indomitable heroic spirit of the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind toward the eminence of a thriving nation full of confidence of victory, optimism and joy, putting spurs to Songun Chollima, to the general offensive under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction with the excellent concert fully reflecting the desire and wishes of the Korean people the artistes of the orchestra presented by displaying the revolutionary creative spirit. He praised them for their successful performance. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that it would conduct dynamic performing activities in the future, too, to powerfully encourage the soldiers and people of the DPRK in their struggle to put up the plate of a powerful nation at the gate of the dignified Songun Korea.
					
					 The audience included senior party, state and army officials.
					
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Un, Ri Ul Sol, Kim Chol Man, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Hong Sok Hyong, Yang Hyong Sop,  Ri Yong Mu,  Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Pyon Yong Rip, Ju Sang Song, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop, O Kuk Ryol and members of the C.C., the WPK, in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Iranian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Iranian FM
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Ali Akbar Salehi on his appointment as foreign minister of Iran. 
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would further develop in politics, economy, culture and other fields, the message wished him success in his future work.

articles.title: DPRK-Russia Diplomats Exchange Views
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Diplomats Exchange Views
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The minister councilor of the DPRK embassy in Moscow and the vice-director of the First Asian Department of the Russian Foreign Ministry met in Moscow on Feb. 1 and exchanged views on the situation on the Korean Peninsula and the issue of resuming the six-party talks.
					The DPRK side re-clarified its invariable stand and will to realize the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula and fully implement the September 19 Joint statement in the spirit of equality and on the principle of simultaneous action.
					
					 The Russian side recognized the DPRK's right to nuclear activities for peaceful purposes and confirmed that the reports of some media that Russia is not opposed to the discussion on the issue of the DPRK's production of enriched uranium at the UNSC are not the official stand of Russia.
					
					 Both sides decided to closely cooperate with each other in the future, too, to ease the situation on the peninsula and resume the six-party talks.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Diplomats of European Countries Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Diplomats of European Countries Held
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry hosted a friendly meeting with staff members of diplomatic missions of European countries here Wednesday on the occasion of the lunar New Year.
					 Present on invitation were diplomatic envoys, officials of embassies and staff members of cooperative missions of European countries.
					
					 Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials of the ministry were present there.
					
					 After speeches were made the participants talked to one another about the need to boost the relations between the DPRK and European countries.

articles.title: Early Opening of North-South Dialogue Called for
articles.content:
Early Opening of North-South Dialogue Called for 
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee sent a notice to the south Korean Ministry of Unification calling for an early opening of north-south dialogue. In this connection Jang Sang Hup, 51, department director of the Ministry of Fishery, said: The proposals of the DPRK calling on the governments, political parties and organizations of the north and the south to have candid discussions on the pending issue at negotiating tables are the most reasonable and specific ones, I think. 
					 Now everything depends on how the south Korean authorities respond to these proposals, he added. 
					
					 Jin Ran Hui, 45, lecturer at the Ssuksom Revolutionary Site Management Office, noted: "National reunification is the unanimous desire of all the Koreans and the task of the times whose fulfillment brooks no further delay." 
					
					  Ssuk Islet is the historic place where patriotic personages in the north and the south of Korea met irrespective of ideology and political view more than six decades ago and discussed the destinies of the country and the nation and reached a consensus of views, she noted.
					
					 "Looking back on those memorable days, I am of the view that the south Korean authorities should respond to the DPRK's proposal for dialogue as early as possible as desired by the nation," she added.

articles.title: World Swamp Day Observed
articles.content:
World Swamp Day Observed
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Today marks World Swamp Day. The United Nations designated "Forest for water and swamp" as the theme of the day this year. 
					 The DPRK is channeling efforts into the protection of swamps and the creation of forests in line with the theme. 
					
					 The Nature Conservation Union of Korea and the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation have worked out specific plans to create shelter belts around swamps in an effort to protect the farm land and provide good habitats to animals.
					
					  Projects are making headway to survey the ecology of the swamps, designate swamp conservation areas and make a rational use of resources there.
					
					 Measures are being taken to prevent damage to forests by fire and harmful insects. Cytological engineering, genetic engineering and other bio-engineering technologies are applied to cultivate trees of good species.
					
					 The DPRK promulgated the Law on Forestation on Dec. 11, Juche 81(1992) to provide a legal guarantee for the creation of forests and their protection.

articles.title: Medical Appliance Popular among People
articles.content:
Medical Appliance Popular among People
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University developed a medical appliance for measuring fatigue from exercises and recuperating with the help of music.
					 The number of its users is on the steady increase in the DPRK.
					
					 This is particularly popular among those who feel physically tired and sports persons.
					
					 It involves the method of Koryo medical treatment to measure the fatigue from exercises.
					
					 By giving external stimulus to the meridian points of a body the appliance helps revitalize its function and quickly recover.
					
					 It ensures the high effect of treatment and has no side effect.
					
					A long use of the appliance is not accompanied by any phenomena unfavorable to its user.

articles.title: New Kind of Wide Spectrum Germicide Developed
articles.content:
New Kind of Wide Spectrum Germicide Developed
						
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Researchers of Pyongyang College of Agriculture of Kim Il Sung University developed a new kind of wide-spectrum germicide.
					 Dr. and Assistant Prof. Pak Ki Dok, 72, said that this germicide is very effective for killing true fungus, bacteria, bacteri-spore, virus, etc. harmful to crops.
					
					 This has marvelous germicidal power and does not leave any toxicity after its disinfection.
					
					 It can be used in diverse ways according to species of crops.
					
					 Its advantages have been proven in the course of its application to different farms in Pyongyang and North Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: Birthplace of Kim Jong Il Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Birthplace of Kim Jong Il Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The number of visitors to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu is now on the steady increase these days.
					 Nearly six million soldiers of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life, school youth and children, overseas Koreans and foreigners have visited it over the last two decades since its opening to visitors. 
					
					 The participants in the study tours march towards Jong Il Peak to learn from the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the indomitable fighting spirit and the ardent patriotism cherished by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 Their programs include meetings to hear impressions of reminiscences by anti-Japanese guerrillas, meetings to hear poems and contests of marchers in singing revolutionary songs in chorus.

articles.title: Patriotic Stand for National Reunification
articles.content:
Patriotic Stand for National Reunification
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The stand of attaching importance to the nation is what the Korean people should take for the country's reunification. 
					 The north side has always adhered to this stand in the effort for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The joint New Year editorial said that the stand of attaching importance to the nation, the stand toward independent reunification, is the touchstone by which to distinguish patriotism from treachery. And it called on the 70 million Koreans in the north, south and abroad to join efforts and bring a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 The DPRK government, political parties and organizations released a joint statement to overcome the present grave situation and open up a decisive phase of reunification with concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 The north side officially proposed to the south side to early open talks between government authorities without condition and resume talks on Red Cross activities, Mt. Kumgang tourism and the Kaesong Industrial Zone as quickly as possible.       
					
					 It has also taken practical steps to this effect.
					
					 The proposals the north side put forward one after another for talks with the south side in the first month of the year came out of its patriotic stand of attaching importance to the nation and achieving the country's reunification and prosperity with united efforts of the nation.
					
					 The offering is not for one side only but for the common interests of the nation and the happiness of the entire Korean people. 
					
					 To create an atmosphere of distrust and confrontation within the nation, depending on outside forces and sticking to one's political view and ideology, is a treacherous act sacrificing the nation's interests for one's sake.
					
					 If a war broke out on the Korean peninsula harassed by the tension, it would not keep even ruling party and conservatives out of danger.
					
					 Besides, outside forces can never save the destiny of the nation in the war.
					
					 This is why the north side called on all concerned about the destiny of the nation to come out in dialogue, irrespective of affiliation, political view and religious belief, letting bygones be bygones.
					
					 It is high time for all the Koreans to take a patriotic stand of attaching importance to the nation.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Join in Struggle for Prosperity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Join in Struggle for Prosperity
						
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a joint statement on Jan. 29 in support of an appeal to all the Koreans. 
					 The statement referred to the fact that the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea issued an appeal to all the Korean people on Jan. 28 and expressed full support and solidarity with it.
					
					 The statement expressed irrepressible resentment at the south Korean authorities who have justified the sycophantic and treacherous conservative regime and totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, swimming against the trend of national reunification.
					
					 Their treacherous moves to tighten the military nexus with the sworn enemies of the nation are unpardonable crimes as they lead to the extermination of the nation by letting the U.S. fish in troubled waters and pave the way for Japan's comeback to the Korean Peninsula, the statement warned. 
					
					 National cooperation means the most ardent patriotism and cooperation with foreign forces the biggest treachery, it noted, calling on all Koreans to unite close in the spirit of by our nation itself and actively join in the nation-wide struggle to achieve prosperity common to the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown on Teacher Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown on Teacher Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Jaju Minbo, an internet newspaper of south Korea, issued a commentary on Jan. 28 denouncing the authorities' suppression. 
					 The commentary accused more than 10 investigators of the National Intelligence Service of conducting a search operation against the lodging quarters and office room of Kim Hyong Gun, teacher affiliated to the south Korean Teachers Union.
					
					 Recalling that he was subject to the authorities' crackdown on charge that he conducted education in issues of national  reunification, the commentary added that not content with this, the hooligans committed such action against him under the absurd pretext that an article posted on his internet homepage was considered as a violation of the "National Security Law." 
					
					 But what was on his homepage was an article calling on the south and the north to pool efforts to achieve reunification and exalt the dignity of the nation, the commentary pointed out. 
					
					 The repressive racket kicked up by the Intelligence Service, taking issue with the article, is aimed to suppress the progressive organization and its members active for reunification and help the conservative ruling forces prolong their remaining days. 
					
					The conservative ruling forces are bound to face a stern judgment by history and the nation as they get frantic with the crackdown upon the people, even blaming the activities to let them know about the true desire for reunification, concluded the commentary.

articles.title: Algerian President Supports DPRK's Proposal
articles.content:
Algerian President Supports DPRK's Proposal
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Korea's reunification is an urgent need of the times.
					 Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, said this when meeting Kim Tong Je, DPRK ambassador to Algeria, who paid a farewell call on him on January 26.
					
					 The president noted that Algeria positively supports the will and initiative of the DPRK to achieve the reunification of the country through the north-south dialogue and negotiations free from outside interference.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Mexico
						
  Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed immortal exploits by wisely leading the Party, the army, the state and the people of the DPRK for decades, nurturing a great desire to glorify Korea in his early years.
					 Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, said this in a statement on January 25 on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il has developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of President Kim Il Sung, an invincible and powerful one and one leading the world socialist movement with his experienced and tested leadership.
					
					 Under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il the base of the Korean revolution was consolidated in every way, signal successes were achieved in the building of a thriving nation and the international prestige of the country was remarkably exalted, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed Abroad
						
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Events were held abroad to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a meeting in Poland and lectures in Guinea between January 21 and 26.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association said that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving nation by creditably carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea noted in a lecture titled "Traces of Devoted Service" that it is quite natural that Kim Jong Il is boundlessly respected and revered by the people for his devoted services for the country and the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea said in a lecture titled "Time of Great Man" that the DPRK would show the world its new appearance as a reunified thriving nation before long thanks to the precious time Kim Jong Il spent for dedicating himself to the country and its people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de Unidad 6556 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de Unidad 6556 del EPC 
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Comandancia de la Unidad 6556 del EPC.
					  En la sala de mando de operaciones se entero en detalles del cumplimiento de la mision de la unidad. 
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que todos los oficiales y soldados de la unidad cumplieran con responsabilidad la mision de guardia vigilando agudamente las maniobras agresivas de los enemigos, reconocio sus esfuerzos y presento las tareas programaticas para incrementar por todos los medios la capacidad combativa de ella. 
					
					  El Comandante Supremo recorrio las salas de estudio militar averiguando el estado de entrenamiento de los comandantes. 
					
					   Se puso contento de que la unidad preparara a todos los comandantes como capaces de organizar y dirigir cualquier dificil combate de la guerra moderna.
					
					Destaco la importancia de establecer un clima revolucionario de entrenamiento para mejorar la capacidad de mando de todos los comandantes como lo demanda la guerra moderna. 
					
					  Averiguo como marcha la labor politica sobre los militares recorriendo la casa de militares y otras facilidades culturales y educativas.
					
					  Luego se cercioro del estado de administracion de la unidad dando una vuelta por el recinto de la comandancia acondicionada como parque.
					
					  Esta unidad dio un avance vertiginoso en el ejercicio de combate y politico, la administracion y los demas aspectos, senalo y evaluo altamente las orgullosas proezas de ella que compartiendo el mismo destino con el partido, ha combatido con coraje como vanguardia en la primera linea de lucha clasista por la victoria de la causa revolucionaria.
					
					  Seguidamente, estuvo en el comedor, la cocina, el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios y otras instalaciones de intendencia prestando profunda atencion a las condiciones de vida de los militares.  
					
					Encomio las magnificas condiciones de vida que facilitaron los comandantes de la unidad para los militares teniendo el correcto punto de vista sobre la labor de intendencia.
					
					El Dirigente se retrato junto con los uniformados de la unidad.
					
					En esta ocasion, el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Won Hong, miembro de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, y el general de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae, miembro del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Instituto de Medicina Jongsong del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Instituto de Medicina Jongsong del EPC
  Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Instituto de Medicina Jongsong del Ejercito Popular de Corea construido recientemente por los constructores militares.
					  Tras estar en la sala de presentacion del historial, recorrio el centro de control de medicamentos, el instituto de farmacologia, la biblioteca electronica, la casa de cultura y otros lugares donde se entero en detalles del estado de investigacion cientifica y de produccion farmaceutica. 
					
					  Al ver las salas de investigacion y laboratorios que tienen sofisticados aparatos de experimento y los procesos de produccion dotados de instalaciones farmaceuticas modernas, se mostro muy satisfecho de que este instituto haya sido acondicionado magnificamente para el fomento de la salud del pueblo consolidando la base de la autoctona industria farmaceutica nacional. 
					
					  Muy contento de que todos los cientificos e investigadores del instituto hayan desarrollado nuevos medicamentos, reconocio los inmensos esfuerzos de ellos. 
					
					  Examino los medicamentos eficientes producidos por el instituto y expreso su satisfaccion de la buena  calidad de ellos, en particular, de los medicamentos de auxilio que los habitantes pueden usar en cualesquier condiciones. 
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas que incumben al instituto. 
					
					  Los cientificos, tecnicos y obreros del instituto deben desarrollar los medicamentos convenientes a la constitucion fisica de nuestro pueblo y ponerlos en produccion, dijo y subrayo la necesidad de producir mucho mas medicamentos de diversos generos, elevar su calidad y mejorar decisivamente el empaque. 
					
					  El cuidado esmerado es el atributo y vida de la salud publica socialista que sirve para las masas populares, ratifico y agrego que todos los empleados del instituto deben ser verdaderos servidores al pueblo que tengan calido humanismo. 
					
					  Recalco que todos los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la rama farmaceutica deben producir y suministrar mucho medicamentos a los organismos profilacticos para que los coreanos, que viviran en la gran potencia prospera, puedan llevar una vida feliz, sanos y longevos. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Yong Chun, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Choe Thae Bok, miembro del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Won Hong, miembro de la Comision Militar Central del PTC Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, miembros del CC del PTC y jefes de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Banquete en honor de miembros de embajada china por el Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Banquete en honor de miembros de embajada china por el Ano Nuevo
						
 Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 100 (2011) de la Era Juche, el Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecio el martes en el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang el banquete en honor de los miembros de la Embajada de la Republica Popular China acreditada en nuestro pais.
					 Fueron invitados alli el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica.
					
					 Tambien estuvieron presentes el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il,  el subjefe del departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Song Nam, y otros funcionarios del susodicho departamento.
					
					 En su discurso, Kim Yong Il senalo que 2010 fue un ano significativo en que bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos dirigentes de los dos paises florecio plenamente el jardin de la tradicional amistad Corea-China.
					
					 Destaco que el ano pasado el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se reunio en varias ocasiones con el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada china.
					
					 Deseo de todo corazon mayores exitos al  partido y el pueblo de China en la lucha por construir una sociedad armoniosa tomando la concepcion del desarrollo cientifico.
					
					 Destaco que tambien en el presente ano hara ingentes esfuerzos por hacer brillar y desarrollar la amistad Corea-China conforme a los propositos de los maximos dirigentes de ambos partidos y paises.
					
					 Liu, en su discurso, se refirio a que 2010 fue un ano significativo en el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales y apunto que se realizaron con mas animacion el intercambio y la cooperacion entre los dos paises en varias esferas.
					
					 Asevero que el ano pasado, el Secretario General Kim Jong Il visito dos veces a China y prosiguio que se alegra de haberse desarrollado mas las relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos y dos paises de China y Corea mediante los viajes de las delegaciones de alto rango.
					
					 Senalo que 2011 es el mas importante ano en el desarrollo de las relaciones China-Corea y manifesto su voluntad de esforzarse por allanar el futuro mas hermoso de las relaciones de ambos partidos y paises.
					
					 Deseo de todo corazon al pueblo coreano nuevos exitos en el proceso de registrar viraje decisivo en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera acatando el editorial conjunto del Ano Nuevo.

articles.title: Ciudadanos exigen la apertura pronta del dialogo N-S
articles.content:
Ciudadanos exigen la apertura pronta del dialogo N-S
 Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- En relacion con que el Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) envio hace poco un aviso al Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea demandando la apertura pronta de los dialogos entre ambas partes, el jefe de departamento del Ministerio de Industria Pesquera, Jang Sang Hup (de 51 anos de edad), dijo asi a la ATCC:
					 Pienso que son mas racionales y concretas nuestras propuestas de sostener las conversaciones sinceras entre los gobiernos, partidos politicos y entidades de ambas partes coreanas sobre los problemas pendientes.
					
					 Ahora la pelota esta en la cancha de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					 Citada por la ATCC, la guia del centro de administracion del lugar de interes historico-revolucionario del islote Suk, Jin Ran Hui (de 45 anos de edad), dijo que la reunificacion de la patria es la unanime voluntad de toda la nacion coreana y la tarea de la epoca de impostergable cumplimiento.
					
					 Preciso que el islote Suk fue la sede de aquella reunion historica celebrada hace mas de 60 anos, en la cual las personalidades patrioticas del Norte y el Sur de Corea con diferentes ideologias y criterios politicos debatieron juntos los problemas relacionados con el destino nacional y llegaron al consenso.
					
					 Recordando esos dias significativos, insisto en que las autoridades surcoreanas acepten cuanto antes nuestra propuesta conforme a la aspiracion nacional, finalizo.

articles.title: Actos por 16 de febrero en Polonia y Guinea
articles.content:
Actos por 16 de febrero en Polonia y Guinea
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvieron lugar del 21 al 26 de enero el mitin en Polonia y conferencias en Guinea.
					El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion Polonia-Corea elogio que el Dirigente continua exitosamente la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y conduce sabiamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					En la conferencia intitulada "Huellas de abnegacion", el presidente del Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche en Conakry de Guinea dijo que es natural que el Dirigente fuera venerado y respetado por el pueblo coreano porque el trabaja abnegadamente por este y el pais.
					
					El presidente de la Sociedad de Estudio de la Literatura e Idea del Juche de Guinea en otra conferencia titulada "Hora del gran hombre" destaco que gracias a las horas valiosas del Dirigente dedicadas a la patria y al pueblo, Corea mostrara al mundo en un futuro cercano su nuevo aspecto de gran potencia prospera reunificada.
